html:
2025-0682
2025-09-25NRCAN, CNSCNuclear Safety and Control ActRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Nuclear Safety and Control Act (Imports, Exports and Safeguards) Regulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Nuclear Safety and Control Act (Imports, Exports and Safeguards) in order to (1) lift the need to present a licence at the border when exporting or importing prescribed information; and (2) include the latest revisions to international control lists, introduce new licence exemptions, enhance licensing information and harmonize record retention periods.Registration: SOR/2025-0196 Publication Date: 2025-10-08
subject: Regulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Nuclear Safety and Control Act (Imports, Exports and Safeguards)
precis: Regulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Nuclear Safety and Control Act (Imports, Exports and Safeguards) in order to (1) lift the need to present a licence at the border when exporting or importing prescribed information; and (2) include the latest revisions to international control lists, introduce new licence exemptions, enhance licensing information and harmonize record retention periods.
